attributes.action: Hold MP's pay rises in line with inflation to set an example to all public & private sector workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the prime Minister to stop MP's rewarding themselves inflation busting pay rises. For years they bleet on about holding pay rises to private & public sector workers while awarding themselves pay rises for spurious reasons well above inflation. It is about time they set an examle to the people that vote for them & put them in the position where they can award themselves large pay rises. Along with claiming massive allowances for their spouse acting as a diary secretary, living allowances for second residences, travel allowances etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
